        Returns the distance reported by the USS, clipping it to maxValue if it is too high

        Returns:
        the distance reported by the USS times a factor (for visibility)

      • isFrontBlock

        public boolean isFrontBlock()
        Compares the value detected by the front USS to a threshold (i.e. if there's an obstacle) and returns the result
        Returns:
        true if the distance is smaller than the threshold, otherwise returns false

      • isSideBlock

        public boolean isSideBlock()
        Compares the value detected by the side USS to a threshold (i.e. if there's an obstacle) and returns the result
        Returns:
        true if the side USS detects a block, false otherwise

      • getFrontDistance

        public double getFrontDistance(int maxValue)
        Returns the distance reported by the front USS wrt the maximum value to clip
        Parameters:
        maxValue - the maximum value allowed by the USS
        Returns:
        the distance detected by the USS

      • getSideDistance

        public double getSideDistance()
        Polls the side USS and returns the distance it detected
        Returns:
        the distance detected by the USS
